title: Oxon Cove  Park & Oxon Hill Farm: Parks as Classrooms
body: Parks as Classrooms        Curriculum Materials Bring Oxon Cove Park to your students. Our on-line lesson plans will be growing over the upcoming months, so check back often.. All Curriculum Materials     Field Trips We offer a variety of field trips for school groups. Our field trips for school groups are offered during the school year and require reservations.  Take a look at our curriculum based education programs and our daily program offerings. All Field Trips
